sentences.en: A positive pregnancy test soon confirmed her intuitive feelings.
sentences.cn: 阳性孕检结果很快证实了她的直觉。

sentences.en: He confirmed what had long been feared.
sentences.cn: 他证实了人们长期以来的担心。

sentences.en: He was confirmed as a member of the Church of England.
sentences.cn: 他领受了坚振礼，成为英国国教会的一员。

sentences.en: He was gratified to hear that his idea had been confirmed.
sentences.cn: 听到自己的想法得到了认可，他感到很开心。

sentences.en: It has confirmed me in my decision not to become a nun.
sentences.cn: 这使我更加坚定了不做修女的决心。

sentences.en: Leonard, a confirmed atheist, simply could not understand.
sentences.cn: 伦纳德这位坚定的无神论者实在是无法理解。

sentences.en: Rumours of job losses were later confirmed.
sentences.cn: 裁员的传言后来得到了证实。
后来发生的事证实了我们的怀疑。

sentences.en: Temperature records have unequivocally confirmed the existence of global warming.
sentences.cn: 气温记录清楚无疑地证实了全球气候正在变暖。

sentences.en: The results confirmed his hypothesis on the use of modal verbs.
sentences.cn: 结果证实了他的关于情态动词用法的假设.

sentences.en: The study confirmed many reports that doctors were improperly trained.
sentences.cn: 该调查证实了许多关于医生未接受充分培训的报道。

sentences.en: Then one day his worst fears were confirmed.
sentences.cn: 后来有一天，他最担心的事终于发生了。

sentences.en: They confirmed by wireless that she was picking up survivors.
sentences.cn: 他们通过无线电证实她在营救幸存者。

sentences.en: Williams has confirmed his position as the world's number one snooker player.
sentences.cn: 威廉姆斯巩固了自己世界头号斯诺克选手的地位。
